commit.message:
[RELEASE] v2.0.0 - Update to HOF v19.0.0 and include pipeline updates

* Add all kube and drone updates with latest hof

* Add event to image to quay

* Use correct Anchore CVE file

* Fix summary page and update drone/kube settings to use private hof config repo

* Uncomment UAT code and refactor files and drone to use hof-services-config

* Add clone repos to master builds

* Update kube namespace names in drone file

* Update duplicated drone steps

* Add drone config for tearing down branch

* Add Notify stub to deployment files

* Use generic notify key name

* Add clone repos for production promotion to drone

* Keep Notify stubbed for now

* Add govuk theme client js for cookie banner

* Add caseworker email

* Add missing fields

* Fix emails and update layouts similar to ROTM

* Use translations in email headers

* Remove old email partials

* Remove old frontend toolkit and use the latest from HOF

* add cookie locals

* Update hof to v19.3.6

* Change availability

* Remove address lookup and use manual address input fields instead

* Fix linting

* update readme

* Use cookie serviceName

* Remove unnessary cookie setup and use defaults from hof

* Update hof 19.3.10

* Add app name to generic locals

* update hof

* update hof 19.3.12

* add sonar property file

* Update drone acceptance

* rebase

* Add validation for after 2010 for date

* Validate townOrCity to not use digits

* Add online and telephone account and order number validations with readme update

* Add uppercase formatter to COL number

* Add correction to formatted date and clear session once form submitted

* Upgrade to hof 19.4.1 and use clear session functionality

* Update date validation content

* Update acceptance test dockerfile

* Add Gemfile lock

* Update drone acceptance deploy

* Setup initial acceptance testing using playwright

* Add snyk

* Update hof 1.19.7

* Update deploy to stg to use relevant kube tokens

* Readd all acceptance tests and validation checks
